import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' import { CircularProgress } from '@material-ui/core' import { Alert, AlertTitle } from '@material-ui/lab' const ContactForm = () => { const { handleSubmit, register, setValue } = useForm() const [loading, setloading] = useState() // useEffect(() => { // register({ name: 'name' }) // register({ name: 'email' }) // register({ name: 'phone_number' }) // register({ name: 'msg_subject' }) // register({ name: 'message' }) // }, []) const onsubmit = values => { const { name, email, phone_number, msg_subject, message } = values console.log('v ', values) setloading(true) emailjs .send( 'Gmail', 'template_rng2cws', { name, email, phone_number, msg_subject, message, }, 'user_ojITwwnFvXK7d1iaDiJ2U', ) .then( function (response) { setloading(false) console.log('SUCCESS!', response.status, response.text) }, function (err) { setloading(false) console.log('FAILED...', err) }, ) } return (
